original_title: หอแต๋วแตก แหกมว๊ากมว๊ากกก
overview: Taew, Mod Dum, and Cartoon are expanding their business so they bought another dormitory. However, faith is not so kind as this dormitory is also haunted. The ghost is a troubled soul because she was murdered and she is hence looking for vengeance. They need to call Pancake back to help as it’s a race against time to find the ghost’s killer before their business goes bankrupt.
title: Oh My Ghost 3
